member.summary: Contains the a Dataset of the Device's Command List

member.summary: Variable for storing the devices Action List URL used in API Class and Discovery.

The Device Object to save.

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.Register
member.summary: Sends the Registration command to the selected device
member.returns: Returns a bool True or False

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.SendAuth(System.String)
member.summary: Sends the Authorization PIN code to the Gen3 Device
member.returns: True or False

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.GetRemoteCommandList
member.summary: This method will retrieve Gen1 and Gen2 XML IRCC Command List or Gen3+ JSON Command List.
member.returns: Returns a string containing the contents of the returned XML Command List for your Use
member.remarks: This method will also populate the SonyDevice.Commands object list with the retrieved command list

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.HttpPost(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes the HTTP Post command
member.param: URL of Device Command to send
Additional parameters

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.CheckReg
member.summary: This method Checks the current Status of the device Registration
member.returns: Returns a Bool True or False

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.CheckStatus
member.summary: This method Gets the current Status of the device
member.returns: Returns the device response as a string

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.GetRegistrationMode
member.summary: Gets the Registration Mode from the ActionList. Or uses Gen 3 if no action list is found.
member.returns: Returns a string wih the Mode (1, 2 or 3)

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.GetCommandString(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to find the Device Command Value based on the Command Name from the SonyDevice.Commands object list.
member.param: A valid command name found in the SonyDevice.Commands object list. (ie: "ChannelUp")
member.returns: Returns the command value for the matched command name. ie: "AAAAAQAAAAEAAAAQAw==". or returns an empty string if no match is found
member.remarks: This can be used with send_ircc("AAAAAQAAAAEAAAAQAw==") like this: send_ircc(getIRCCcommandString("ChannelUp")

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.SendText(System.String)
member.summary: This method send Inputed Text via an HTTP GET command
member.param: A string containing the text to send to the device
member.returns: Returns the device response as a string

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.GetText
member.summary: This method Gets Text
member.returns: Returns the device response as a string

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.hdmi_1
member.summary: Sends a mdf command for input HDMI 1

member.summary: Sends a mdf command for input HDMI 2

member.summary: Sends a mdf command for input HDMI 3

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.ChannelSet(System.String)
member.summary: This public method can be used to tune to a complete channel.
member.param: A string containing a valid complete channel. (ie. 47.1)

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.CheckFullPath(System.String)
member.summary: If Param is NOT full path, returns the Full path. Example: /cers/IRCC is Not a full path, will return: HTTP://192.168.0.xxx:8080/cers/IRCC
member.param: Path to check

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.GetServerMac
member.summary: getControlMac retrieves the MAC address from the static method GetMacAddress().
member.returns: A string containing a processed MAC address. For example: Actual Mac 01:02:03:04:05:06 returns 01-02-03-04-05-06

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.GetMacAddress
member.summary: Static method used to obtain your NIC MAC address.
member.returns: A string containing the MAC address of the fastest NIC found in your system.
member.remarks: Should not be used publically. Use the getControlMac() method instead.

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.GetDeviceMac(SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice)
member.summary: Method used to retrieve Gen3 Devices Mac Address
member.param: The SonyDevice to obtain the Mac Address From

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.BuildFromDocument(System.Uri)
member.summary: Builds a SonyDevice object based on the devices Description document URL.
member.param: A URI containg the URL to the device's Description XML file.
member.returns: A Fully built and populated Sony Device

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.BuildFromDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds a SonyDevice object based on the devices Description document text.
member.param: A string containg the Description XML.
A string containg the Full Path to the device's Description XML file.
member.returns: A Fully built and populated Sony Device

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice.WOL
member.summary: Sends the device a "Wake-On-Lan" command

member.name: T:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.APILogging
member.summary: Sony Device Logging Class Very Basic Logging System to txt file.

member.name: P:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.APILogging.Enable
member.summary: Gets or Sets Enabling cerDevice API Logging True - Turns Loggin On False - Turns Loggin Off

member.name: P:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.APILogging.Level
member.summary: Gets or Sets Enabling cerDevice API Logging Level Basic - for only basic entries All - for all entries

member.name: P:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.APILogging.Path
member.summary: Gets or Sets the cerDevice API logging path Destination Folder MUST exist. Must be Full Path. ex: c:\programdata\sony\

member.name: P:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.APILogging.Name
member.summary: Gets or Sets the cerDevice API logging file name Must be a .txt file default is cerDevice_LOG.txt

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.APILogging.AddMessage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method writes the log entries to the specified file location.
member.param: This is the Text message to be added to the log file
Set to true to ALWAYS log this message. Otherwise set to false

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.APILogging.ClearLog(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to Clear the current log and start a new.
member.param: Default is Null. If NOT Null, Log file is copied to newName before it is Cleared!

member.summary: Executes the GetMediaInfo action.
member.param: The Device object to execute the request on.
member.remarks: Populates the following State Variable: Number of Tracks, Track Duration, Track Meta Data, Track URI, Next URI, Next URI Meta Data, Record Medium and Current Record Write Status.

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.AVTransport1.GetTransportInfo(SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice)
member.summary: Executes the GetTransportInfo action.
member.param: The Parent Device object to execute this action on.
member.remarks: Populates the following State Variables: Current Transport State, Current Transport Status, Current Play Speed

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.AVTransport1.GetPosition(SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice)
member.summary: Executes the GetPositionInfo action.
member.param: The Parent Device object to execute this action on.
member.remarks: Populates the following State Variables: Curent Track, Track Duration, Track Meta Data, Track URI, Relative Time, Absolute Time, Relative Counter and Absolute Counter.

member.name: M:SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.AVTransport1.GetDeviceCapabilities(SonyAPILib.SonyAPILib.SonyDevice)
member.summary: Executes the GetDeviceCapabilities action.

member.summary: Executes the GetTransportSettings action.
